response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that I believe will significantly enhance your endeavors and bring substantial value to your business. After careful consideration, I am extending a special offer to purchase this product at a price of $1,350,000. This amount reflects not only the intrinsic value of the product but also the unique benefits it offers to someone like yourself who can fully appreciate its potential. I trust that this proposal will be favorable to you, allowing us to collaborate on a mutually beneficial transaction. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. Looking forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 1350000}
